nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice melting sequence drawn with arrows indicating melting and refreezing
Egg cooking sequence drawn with an arrow indicating cracking and frying
Depicted ice cube as solid and water as liquid
Arrows show ice can refreeze back into a cube
Depicted egg before cracking as raw and egg in pan as cooked
Illustrated that cooked egg cannot turn back to raw
